adDetails: Urgent move on your agenda? Too much for you to handle alone? Don't worry! I'm a moving professional and have been helping people move themselves for many years.I can handle the tasks that are necessary to make moving a breeze! ^ helper^ Â«Labor OnlyÂ» I'm a hard working individual with a strong desire to get the job done right! My exceptional service is available to you for only $25.00 per hour, per person, 2 hour minimum. Please, call me for honest and reliable help show contact info ~~~~>Antonio available 24/7 Thanks! Hi Everybody, just want you to know that Antonio and his assistant did a fantastic job loading our 17 foot U-Haul truck in San Francisco, We went all the way to Palm Springs. Only a few things moved in the truck and when we moved in to our new home absolutely nothing was broken. We are extremely pleased with Antonio's services in every way. He was excellent to communicate, he was on time, he was cheerful and positive and he made the stressful experience of moving (almost) a pleasure. We've had bad movers in the past, so we know what thats like -- so we are very happy to say: "Thank you, Antonio!" peace and success to everybody, David and Linda Ramsdale (happily in Palm Springs, CA :))
